description: A record of whether a given user passed a given test

userId.description: The principal id of the user

responseId.description: The id of the user's response

score.description: The score the user received on the test

passed.description: Whether the user passed the given test

passedOn.description: Date/time when the user passed the test (omitted if the user has not passed)

revokedOn.description: Date/time when the passing record was revoked (omitted if the record was not revoked)

revoked.description: True if the record is revoked, false otherwise

corrections.description: For each response, whether it was correct
